testcase.brief: Got multiple vid pairs from radius server
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: -create a ssid on AP, wpa 802.1x -cofing a radius account to return three vids from access-accept(local radius server with db-type AD) -config three user-groups with vlan-id 'user-group xxx vlan-id 16'
Test Procedure: -STA1 connects to ssid -check the vids returned from access-accept -check the vid applied to STA1, result 1,2,3,4

step.telnet: -v "security-object autoap" -v "security-object autoap security protocol-suite wpa2-aes-8021x" -v "security-object autoap security aaa radius primary ${ap1.mgt0.ip}" -v "security-object autoap default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "aaa radius-server local db-type local" -v "aaa radius-server local enable" -v "user-group xxx" -v "aaa radius-server local user-group xxx" -v "user ${pub.radius1.username}" -v "user ${pub.radius1.username} password ${pub.radius1.passwd}" -v "user ${pub.radius1.username} group xxx" -v "user-group xxx vlan-id ${tb.vlan1}" -v "user-group xxx vlan-id ${tb.vlan4}" -v "user-group xxx vlan-id ${tb.vlan2}" -v "user-group xxx user-attribute 2"

step.desc: -config a ssid and bind it to interface
step.telnet: -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object autoap" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "user-profile ttt qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan3} attribute 2" -v "interface wif0 radio channel 1" -v "_debug auth all" -v "clear log all"

step.log-match: -b "Value:" -ps p "Value: '<01>${tb.vlan2}'" p "Attribute \d+ \(Tunnel-Private-Group-ID\)" p "RADIUS message: code=\d+ \(Access-Accept\)" -e "RADIUS message: code=" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
